text: John William Foss (February 13, 1933 - April 25, 2020) was a retired United States Army four-star general. He was a commander of the United States Army Training and Doctrine Command. Foss died on April 25, 2020 at the age of 87.FORMER TRADOC COMMANDER GEN. title: John W. Foss
